abstract: Reports of a deal between Israel and Hamas to secure the release of Sergeant Shalit, an abducted Israeli soldier, in exchange for Palestinian prisoners.
snippet: Reports of a deal between Israel and Hamas to secure the release of Sergeant Shalit, an abducted Israeli soldier, in exchange for Palestinian prisoners.
lead_paragraph: Updated | 4:38 p.m. As my colleague Ethan Bronner reports, Israel and Hamas have agreed to exchange Palestinian prisoners for an Israeli soldier held captive for more than five years. The soldier, Staff Sgt. Gilad Shalit, was seized by Palestinian militants in Gaza in a cross-border raid inside Israel in June 2006.

headline.main: 2009 Video of Gilad Shalit in Captivity
